name: nextstep-gsc-extractor
description: Automated Google Search Console keyword data extractor for Next Step Therapy

scripts.setup: npm install && echo 'Setup complete! Run: npm run extract'
scripts.schedule-daily: echo '0 9 * * * cd /Users/jessecynamon/NextStepTherapy && npm run extract' | crontab -
scripts.schedule-weekly: echo '0 9 * * 1 cd /Users/jessecynamon/NextStepTherapy && npm run extract' | crontab -

author: Next Step Therapy
